articles.title: Montgomery metro area now ‘very high risk’ on COVID-19 risk indicator - WSFA
articles.description: All of the counties in the Montgomery metropolitan area are now considered “very high risk” on Alabama’s COVID-19 risk indicator.
articles.content:
MONTGOMERY, Ala. (WSFA) - All of the counties in the Montgomery metropolitan area are now considered very high risk on Alabamas COVID-19 risk indicator.

articles.title: Recall alert: Drug company, FDA announce recall due to drug mix-up - WSB Atlanta
articles.description: Drug company AvKARE has announced the recall of a single lot of sildenafil and a single lot of trazodone after the two medications were inadvertently packaged together, the Food and Drug Administration said.
